input.activity_signal: No recent activity signals found. FCC filing was only in 2019 with no recent activity noted. Web search results show FCC Form 499 database entries and regulatory notices from 2020-2021, but no active company website, current business operations, or recent filings. The most recent meaningful activity appears to be from 2021 FCC public notices (DA-21-15, DA-21-100).
input.product_summary: HDC Alpha, LLC was an interconnected VoIP provider that intended to provide VoIP services initially in Colorado, as evidenced by their FCC numbering authorization application.
